sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Cart.css"; import useCart from "../../CustomHooks/useCart"; import AppContext from "../../AppContext"; export default function Cart({cartLength,cartVisible,toggleCart}) { const {handleQuantityChange } = AppContext(); cont const totalCost = cart.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.quantity, 0).toFixed(2); return (

Cart

{cart.map((cartItem) => (

{cartItem.title}

{cartItem.price * cartItem.quantity} $

Quantity: {cartItem.quantity}

))}

Total Cost: {totalCost} $

); }
